wikipedia_page.main: Seren Gibson (born 16 January 1988 in Ruthin, Denbighshire, Wales) is a British former glamour model. She has appeared topless and nude in photo spreads for several men's magazines and on Page 3 of the UK newspaper Daily Star. She featured in the British TV series My Crazy Media Life.

response: *Seren Gibson (born 1988), glamour model, attended Ysgol Brynhyfryd.
